lgp.core.environment.dataset

Class Dataset<TAttribute>

  • lgp.core.environment.dataset.Dataset<TAttribute>
  • Type Parameters:
    TAttribute - The type of the attributes that the instances in this data set represents.

    public class Dataset<TAttribute>

    A basic data set made up of a collection of class Instances.

    An abstract implementation is provided in order to permit the freedom to have differing implementation details per interface DatasetLoader.

    Despite this liberal approach, there are some parts of the implementation that are rigid:

    • Any extending classes need to pass a list of instances to the constructor appropriately; clearly this can be customised to the intended use case.

    • The shape of the data set is specified as a collection of instances and functions for specifying the class attribute of these instances, as well as information about the number of attributes/instances are provided which can not be modified (see the functions marked final).

    While the behaviour for these functions could be modified, care would need to be taken.

    See Also:
    class Instance, interface DatasetLoader

      • Dataset

        public Dataset(java.util.List<? extends lgp.core.environment.dataset.Instance<? extends TAttribute>> instances)

        A basic data set made up of a collection of class Instances.

        An abstract implementation is provided in order to permit the freedom to have differing implementation details per interface DatasetLoader.

        Despite this liberal approach, there are some parts of the implementation that are rigid:

        • Any extending classes need to pass a list of instances to the constructor appropriately; clearly this can be customised to the intended use case.

        • The shape of the data set is specified as a collection of instances and functions for specifying the class attribute of these instances, as well as information about the number of attributes/instances are provided which can not be modified (see the functions marked final).

        While the behaviour for these functions could be modified, care would need to be taken.

        Parameters:
        instances - The instances belonging to this data set.
        See Also:
        class Instance, interface DatasetLoader

    • Method Detail

      • classAttribute

        public void classAttribute(int index)

        Sets the index of the class class Attribute for each class Instance.

        Parameters:
        index - An index such that 0 <= idx < len(instances).
        See Also:
